select `m`.`material_id`, omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, `m`.`model_id`, `m`.`serial_no`,`m`.`ocm`,`m`.`level`,`m`.`reception_time`, `m`.`agreed_date`,`m`.`inline_time`, `m`.`fix_type`,`m`.`service_repair_flg`, `m`.`section_id`,`m`.`wip_location`,`m`.`direct_flg`, `m`.`scheduled_expedited`,`m`.`scheduled_manager_comment`,`m`.`quotation_first`, `m`.`outline_time`,`m`.`break_back_flg`,`m`.`pat_id`, `mdl`.`name` as model_name, `ctg`.`category_id`, `ctg`.`name` as category_name, `ctg`.`kind` FROM MATERIAL `m` JOIN `MODEL` mdl ON `m`.`model_id` = `mdl`.`model_id` JOIN `CATEGORY` ctg ON `mdl`.`category_id` = `ctg`.`category_id` WHERE `m`.`material_id` = #{material_id};

SELECT a.material_id, omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, a.model_id, (select name from model where model_id = a.model_id) as model_name, a.serial_no, a.ocm, a.level, a.section_id, (select name from section where section_id = a.section_id) as section_name, a.scheduled_expedited, a.direct_flg, a.service_repair_flg, a.fix_type, a.wip_location, a.pat_id, (select Concat(p1.process_code," ",p1.name) from position p1 join production_feature p2 on p1.position_id = p2.position_id where p2.material_id = a.material_id and p1.line_id <>13 and p2.operate_result not in (5, 8) order by (1-ISNULL(p2.action_time)), p2.action_time desc limit 1) as processing_position, date_format(a.reception_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as reception_time, agreed_date, date_format(a.inline_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as inline_time, (select date_format(finish_time, '%Y-%m-%d') from production_feature where position_id in (select position_id from position where special_page = 'quotation') and material_id = a.material_id order by finish_time desc limit 1) as finish_time, (select operate_result from production_feature where material_id = a.material_id and operate_result not in (5, 8) order by (1-ISNULL(action_time)), action_time desc limit 1) as operate_result, date_format(a.outline_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as outline_time, a.scheduled_manager_comment, coalesce(a.scheduled_date ,(select scheduled_date from material_process where line_id in (select line_id from line where in_advance = 0) and material_id = a.material_id)) as scheduled_date from Material a where a.material_id = #{id};

SELECT a.material_id, omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, a.model_id, (select name from model where model_id = a.model_id) as model_name, a.serial_no, a.ocm, a.level, a.section_id, (select name from section where section_id = a.section_id) as section_name, a.scheduled_expedited, a.direct_flg, a.service_repair_flg, a.fix_type, a.wip_location, a.reception_time, a.agreed_date, a.selectable, (select date_format(finish_time, '%Y-%m-%d') from production_feature where position_id in (select position_id from position where special_page = 'quotation') and material_id = a.material_id order by finish_time desc limit 1) as finish_time, date_format(a.outline_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as outline_time, a.scheduled_manager_comment, (select date_format(scheduled_date, '%Y-%m-%d') from material_process where line_id in (select line_id from line where in_advance = 0) and material_id = a.material_id) as scheduled_date, a.Quotation_first from Material a where a.material_id = #{id}; -- and a.break_back_flg = 0

mapper.select: SELECT date(ma.reception_time) AS reception_time, ma.ocm, ma.agreed_date, ma.omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, mo.name as model_name, ma.serial_no, ma.level, ma.service_repair_flg, ma.direct_flg, srm.service_free_flg, mp.arrival_plan_date AS arrival_plan_date_start FROM material ma LEFT JOIN (select * from service_repair_manage where material_id like '0%') `srm` ON cast(`ma`.material_id as char) = `srm`.material_id LEFT JOIN model mo ON ma.model_id=mo.model_id LEFT JOIN material_partial mp ON ma.material_id=mp.material_id WHERE ma.material_id=#{material_id} and mp.occur_times=#{occur_times}
